meanings.definition: A drug used to suppress the immune system.
meanings.sent1: The doctor prescribed azathioprines to help my body accept a new kidney.
meanings.sent2: Many patients with autoimmune diseases rely on azathioprines to manage their condition.
meanings.sent3: When the immune system got too rowdy, the azathioprines played referee.
meanings.sent4: Her immune system was a wild party, but azathioprines turned down the music.
meanings.sent5: Azathioprines acted like a calm bouncer, keeping the immune system in check.

meanings.sent1: The pharmacy stocked various medications, including azathioprines.
meanings.sent2: Doctors discussed the benefits of azathioprines in treating certain conditions.
meanings.sent3: The shelf was full of azathioprines, standing in solidarity.
meanings.sent4: In the lab, they studied the effects of different azathioprines.
meanings.sent5: The box contained a mix of azathioprines, each labeled clearly.
